data.title: Andrew Lane - Director of Broadcast & Production at FACEIT
data.meta_description: Andrew Lane has held a variety of roles in the broadcast and production industry.
data.text:
Andrew Lane has held a variety of roles in the broadcast and production industry. In 2013, they worked as a Supermarket Assistant (Seasonal - Full Time) at Waitrose. In 2014, they were a Broadcast Production Developer (Part Time) at European Gaming League. In 2015, they worked as a Software Architect Office Intern at Atos and a Broadcast Consultant at AL Consulting. From 2018 to 2022, they held three roles at FACEIT Ltd, including Director of Broadcast & Production, Director of Broadcast, and Technical Broadcast Manager. Andrew is currently a Senior Director of Broadcast & Production at ESL FACEIT Group [EFG].

Andrew Lane attended Bedford Modern School from 2006 to 2013 and obtained a European Computer Driving License from BCS, The Chartered Institute for IT in March 2008. Andrew then went on to The University of Manchester, where they graduated with a degree in Computer Science with a focus in Computer Software Engineering in 2017.
